group
Interface GroupService

public interface GroupService

Interface offering other components group related functionalities.

Method Summary
 void changeOwner(User newOwner, Group group)
          Group Service starts performing the necessary steps for ownership transfer.
 void informGroupChange(Change change)
          The SynchronizationService component informs the Group Service component about a group change, and the Group Service in turn will transmit this information for processing to the GroupManagement component.
 void inviteExternalPerson(java.lang.String email, Group group)
          Group Service starts performing the necessary steps for inviting an external person into the given group.
 void inviteUser(User user, Group group)
          Group Service starts performing the necessary steps for inviting an user into the given group.
 void processMessage(Message message)
          The MessagingService forwards a read message to the Group Service in order to apply group changes depending on the message content and type.

informGroupChange

void informGroupChange(Change change)
The SynchronizationService component informs the Group Service component about a group change, and the Group Service in turn will transmit this information for processing to the GroupManagement component.

Parameters:
change -
group -

processMessage

void processMessage(Message message)
The MessagingService forwards a read message to the Group Service in order to apply group changes depending on the message content and type. E.g if the message is an invitation acceptance, the GroupManagement will add the user to the group and then use SynchronizationService to transmit this change to other users.

Parameters:
message -
